preqs: Students must have passed 24 points at Level 5 from the Department of Econometrics and Business Statistics.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05}
Must have passed 24 credit points from units owned by {50000783}
Must have passed 24 credit points at levels {5} from units owned by {50000783}

description: Under supervision, students are expected to undertake and report on an original research topic that addresses a contemporary and significant issue in the field of applied or theoretical econometrics. Students must find a suitable supervisor and have selected an appropriate area of research in order to undertake this unit.
